input.sentences: [female] 's wedding . all her friends and relatives are gathered here .
i love [female] 's dress . black is much better than white for her .

everybody getting drunk in this club tonight .
output.sentences: Today at the wedding, the relatives gathered.
Male and female guests were dressed in fancy clothes.
Although not wearing white, it was clear how much the female bride loved her new husband.
After the wedding, everyone went to the club to celebrate.
Tonight they will get drunk in the club and then leave in the morning for their honeymoon.
